name: 2tomani
description: This kind of lighter was known as "2tomani" in cafe. "2tomani" refers to the price of each lighter which was 2000toman equivalent to 20000 Iranian rials. as a dishwasher i earned 6000tomans/60000rials an hour. 6000 toman now equals 0.21USD !:))) so they where cheap disposable lighters. i drew this on my sony Xperia LT26i scrached screen using andriod paintfree app. no layers, no photo transforms.because the app has a limited size i just took screenshot of my work.this one includes an in-app advertisement I found very fun then.
